songs.title: Lay Back
songs.lyrics:
Sit back down
Lay back down

Lay back and let it go
Cause it only gets worse
Life is shit, and then you die
And the heaven's doors are closed
Lay back

Now what you hear is not a test
Somebody better go get my cash
And as a matter of fact
Like a heart attack
I suggest you all sit back
Its like i been telling you for so long
Shit can go real real wrong
Let life flow, act like you know
Hell yeah we gonna drop that bomb

So lay back, dance or pretend
Cause this is as good
This is as good
This is as good, as it gets
I'm sorry is the pot of gold already gone?
Don't you know life its like a shot gun
Yeah keep chilling, kick back have fun
Don't you know life its like a shot gun
Dip down and say it low
Cause life is the only heaven we know
Dip down and say it low
Cause life is the only heaven we know
